===========================
00: MOD DESCRIPTION
===========================

Powerful Perks Expanded (PPE) adds additional ranks to *nearly* every perk to include 10 full ranks. 

PPE also rewards players who specialize in a specific skill tree/profession! Specializing in a skill is now far more awesome than being a \"jack-of-all trades\" character that can do everything.

(((EXAMPLE))))
Armsman1	One-Handed weapons do 20% more damage.
Armsman2	One-Handed weapons do 40% more damage.
Armsman3	One-Handed weapons do 60% more damage.
Armsman4	One-Handed weapons do 80% more damage.
Armsman5	One-Handed weapons do 100% more damage.
Armsman6	One-Handed weapons do 120% more damage.
Armsman7	One-Handed weapons do 140% more damage.
Armsman8	One-Handed weapons do 160% more damage.
Armsman9	One-Handed weapons do 180% more damage.
Armsman10	One-Handed weapons do 200% more damage.


***Please see the full list for all the changes.***

===========================
01: UPDATES
===========================

[Feb10] MAJOR update (besure to uninstall and delete all OLD PPE.esp files!

- Fixed all dualcasting (please test and report issues)
- Fixed Many RANK issues for all skills...etc etc
- Previous ranks that vanished or displayed wrong should be fixed and show 10/10 (like Destruction Dual Casting)
- Fixed Muffled perk, values now properly apply
- Fixed Sneak Backstab (you no longer need the \"half values\" hack fix)
- Lowered DeadlyAim sneak multipliers to match Backstab values
- Fixed Enchanting so that MagicDamage is useful and no more overpowered 112% MagicResist enchants!

===========================
02: PERK FILES
===========================

Each skill tree is being divded into its own stand-alone ESP so you can pick and choose from. You can use one or all of them if you wish. 


PPE_Perk-Alchemy.esp
PPE_Perk-Alteration.esp

===========================
03: PPE - OPTIONAL PLUGINS
===========================

These option plugins offer additional tweaked perk ranks, load these AFTER the perks ESPs listed above.

////
PPE_Perk-Optional_ExtraPockets_max1000.esp
PPE_Perk-Optional_ExtraPockets_max500.esp
	--> 10 ranks, +100 (or+50) Carry Weight per rank.

////
PPE_Perk-Optional_WeaponSpeedPerk.esp
	--> 10 ranks, Changes \"Dual Flurry\" under One-Handed skill tree to a NEW perk called \"Weapon Speed\" 	that effects attack speed of ALL weapons (swords, dual wield, twohanded and bows!)

////
PPE_Perk-Optional_BackstabDamageForAllMelee.esp
	--> Alters Sneak/Backstab perk to apply to ALL weapons (including twohanded and bows!) You can further 			upgrade your backstab damage with other perks.

////
PPE_Perk-PPE_Perk-Optional_HeavyArmor_NoHelmsReq.esp
	Removes helmet requirement from these perks: Cushioned, Well Fitted, Matching Set, Reflect Blows

////
PPE_Perk-PPE_Perk-Optional_LightArmor_NoHelmsReq.esp
	Removes helmet requirement from these perks: Custom Fit,Matching Set,Wind Walker,Deft Movement



===========================
04: PPE - Full list of changes
===========================

FULL list of changes are here: (PDF) http://db.tt/kHQ0kx2t
Also see the downloads section under MISC.


===========================
05: ISSUES
===========================

*Hack and Slash is meant to be 3 ranks for now.

*Bugs in values are likely present, if you see something that doesnt seem right, let me know so I can fix it.

**Report all bugs!**

===========================
06: COMPATIBLITY WITH OTHER MODS
===========================

*PPE will conflict with other mods that alter perks, your best bet is to load PPE at the end of your load order. If you want another perk-mod to overwrite a change in PPE, load that mod after PPE.

*PPE is OKAY with mods that ADD NEW perks, weapons, armor or spells!!

*PPE will conflict with other mods that alter perk-related spell entries

*PPE should be compatible with mods that add weapons, armor, spells, UI and textures...etc

*PPE doesn\'t fully work if using a perk-reset mod. You\'ll get all your perk points back, but it will remember that you had already-assigned points, nothing I can do about this*


===========================
07: INSTALL/UNINSTALL
===========================

!!!WARNING!!!

It is highly recommended that you use PPE with a NEW SAVE game. Remember to back up all your save games BEFORE using PPE because it changes ALOT of perk data.

This mod WILL work with current saved game also, but back up your saves!

!!!WARNING!!!


Place ESP files in your SKYRIM\\DATA\\ folder. 
Activate them with NexusModManager(NMM).
Be sure to load \"OPTIONAL\" files after main PPE-Perk files.
